description.en: The angle between the Y-axis of the local coordinate system and a global north-south meridian.

A GeoJSON Point coordinate indicating the placement of the local coordinate system origin point (0,0) in the containing global coordinate system. Units: X and Y coordinates in decimal degrees, altitude (if present) in meters.

A georeference provides linkage between the local coordinate system used within a building (e.g., measured in meters) and a global coordinate system (e.g., lat, long, alt), such that locally placed Spaces can be resolved and rendered in that global coordinate system (e.g., for mapping purposes).
